vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.12.21;
son of: Joash (H3101I) and Jehoaddan (H3086); married to Jecoliah (H3203);
father of: Uzziah (H5818)
§ Amaziah = "Jehovah is mighty"
1) a king of Judah, son Joash, father of Azariah
2) a priest of Bethel under Jeroboam II
3) father of Joshah, of the tribe of Simeon
4) a Levite tabernacle singer in David's day
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) אֲמַצְיָהוּ   hijo de Joás; rey de Judá ; (b)   padre de Josías; tribu de Simeón; (c)   hijo de Hilquías; ancestro de Etán; tribu de Leví; (d)   sacerdote de Betel; en tiempos del profeta Amós
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞瑪謝 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華是全能"
1) 猶大君王, 約阿施之子, 亞撒利雅之父 (王下 14:1)
2) 耶羅波安二世時代, 伯特利的一祭司, (摩 7:10)
3) 約沙之父, 西緬族 (代上 4:34)
4) 大衛王統治時, 在聖殿的利未歌者 (代上 6:45)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚玛谢 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华是全能"
1) 犹大君王, 约阿施之子, 亚撒利雅之父 (王下 14:1)
2) 耶罗波安二世时代, 伯特利的一祭司, (摩 7:10)
3) 约沙之父, 西缅族 (代上 4:34)
4) 大卫王统治时, 在圣殿的利未歌者 (代上 6:45)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.34;
father of: Joshah (H3144)
§ Amaziah = "Jehovah is mighty"
1) a king of Judah, son Joash, father of Azariah
2) a priest of Bethel under Jeroboam II
3) father of Joshah, of the tribe of Simeon
4) a Levite tabernacle singer in David's day

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.45;
son of: Hilkiah (H2518I);
father of: Hashabiah (H2811)
§ Amaziah = "Jehovah is mighty"
1) a king of Judah, son Joash, father of Azariah
2) a priest of Bethel under Jeroboam II
3) father of Joshah, of the tribe of Simeon
4) a Levite tabernacle singer in David's day

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Amo.7.10
§ Amaziah = "Jehovah is mighty"
1) a king of Judah, son Joash, father of Azariah
2) a priest of Bethel under Jeroboam II
3) father of Joshah, of the tribe of Simeon
4) a Levite tabernacle singer in David's day
